attributes.action: Parliament must accept the EU referendum result and not seek a vote on this.
attributes.additional_details: There have been moves by Parliament to take a vote on EU membership and thereby overthrow the EU referendum result. In addition,  are high court cases to seek a judicial review. The result of the EU referendum is that Briain should leave the EU. Government and Parliament must accept this and act honourably to carry out the wishes of the British people.
attributes.background: The EU referendum was undertaken in good faith. Parliament must not seek to use a vote or debate to overthrow the result or have 2nd referendum or general election on this issue. The people have spoken.
